casebody.data:
William LANGAN, Plaintiff-Appellee, v. AMERICAN SCANTIC LINES, Inc., Defendant-Appellant. No. 363. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. May 18, 1936. David M. Fink & Jacquin Frank, of New York City (Jacquin Frank, of New York City, of counsel), for plaintiff. Tompkins, Boal & Tompkins, of New York City (Arthur M. Bpal and Francis J. Fitzpatrick, both of New York City, of counsel), for defendant.

Before MANTON, SWAN, and CHASE, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Judgment affirmed.
